import React, { useState } from 'react'; import "./header.css"; const Header = () => { window.addEventListener("scroll", function () { const header = document.querySelector(".header"); if (this.scrollY >= 80) header.classList.add("scroll-header"); else header.classList.remove("scroll-header"); }); const [Toggle, showMenu] = useState(false); const [activeNav, serActiveNav] = useState("#home") return (
Ariq Naufal Fadhlurrahman
  • serActiveNav('#home')} className={activeNav === "#home" ? "nav_link active-link" : "nav_link "}> Home

showMenu(!Toggle)}>

) } export default Header
